Summary: 5 reddish/orange lights,inverted 's' formation, some lights pulsed bright-then-dimmed, traveled slow westward, then dimmed out
divs: sighting detailsfirst sighting actually occured on august 4th, at intersection of m-53 & m-59, shelby township\utica, mi. at approx. 9:40pm. four (4) reddish\orange lights, facing southwest, approx. 80 degrees from horizon, curved pattern to right, steady glow, equally spaced. second sighting occured at my residence (corner of m-59 & hayes, macomb township)between 9:40pm & 9:45pm. same reddish\orange lights caught my attention, this time facing northeast, approx. 30 degrees from horizon. five (5) lights appeared moving slowly westward in an inverted 's' shaped pattern. some lights were pulsing bright-then-dim. within a span of two-to-three minutes the lights all dimmed then disappeared. both occurances were near selfridge air national guard base. perhaps some kind of military activity\training?
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Macomb
There was one other sighting in Macomb on or around August 18th 2012
